Package net.nextinfinity.core.classes

Interface ClassEditor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreClassEditor

    public interface ClassEditor
    The ClassEditor is an in-game editor to allow admins to create classes without having to manually edit files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addEffect​(java.lang.String potionType)
      Adds a potion effect to the class.
      void close​()
      Closes the editing session.
      org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getAddEffectMenu​()
      Gets the menu to add a new potion effect to the class.
      org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getColorMenu​()
      Gets the menu to set the color for the class.
      org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getCurrentEffectMenu​()
      Gets the menu of existing potion effects for the class.
      org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getInventory​()
      Gets the primary inventory menu where items/armor may be edited and other menus may be accessed.
      GamePlayer getPlayer​()
      Gets the GamePlayer associated with the ClassEditor
      void open​()
      Opens the editing session.
      void removeEffect​(java.lang.String potionType)
      Removes a potion effect from the class.
      void setColor​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack wool)
      Sets the ChatColor for the class to that associated with a wool ItemStack.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open​()
        Opens the editing session. This should be called after the creation of the ClassEditor object.
        The ClassEditor inventory menu will be opened for the player.

      • close

        void close​()
        Closes the editing session.
        It is at this point that the edited class data is saved to the disk.

      • setColor

        void setColor​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack wool)
        Sets the ChatColor for the class to that associated with a wool ItemStack. The wool must have the "color" NBT string set to a valid ChatColor.
        Parameters:
        wool - the wool object corresponding to the desired ChatColor

      • addEffect

        void addEffect​(java.lang.String potionType)
        Adds a potion effect to the class. If the effect does not exist, it will be added at level 1, otherwise its level will be incremented.
        Parameters:
        potionType - the internal name of the potion effect to add

      • removeEffect

        void removeEffect​(java.lang.String potionType)
        Removes a potion effect from the class. If the effect is level one, it will be removed, otherwise its level will be decremented.
        Parameters:
        potionType - the internal name of the potion effect to remove

      • getPlayer

        GamePlayer getPlayer​()
        Gets the GamePlayer associated with the ClassEditor
        Returns:
        the GamePlayer using the ClassEditor

      • getInventory

        org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getInventory​()
        Gets the primary inventory menu where items/armor may be edited and other menus may be accessed.
        Returns:
        the main inventory menu

      • getColorMenu

        org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getColorMenu​()
        Gets the menu to set the color for the class.
        Returns:
        the color menu

      • getCurrentEffectMenu

        org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getCurrentEffectMenu​()
        Gets the menu of existing potion effects for the class.
        Returns:
        the current effect menu

      • getAddEffectMenu

        org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getAddEffectMenu​()
        Gets the menu to add a new potion effect to the class.
        Returns:
        the add effect menu
